夢.definition: dream (CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]); (bound form) to dream

夢到.definition: to dream of; to dream about

夢囈.definition: talking in one's sleep; delirious ravings; nonsense; sheer fantasy

夢寐以求.definition: lit. to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom); fig. to deeply long for; to covet

夢溪筆談.definition: Dream Pool Essays by Shen Kuo 沈括[Shen3 Kuo4], book on various fields of knowledge, the first to describe the magnetic needle compass

夢羅園.definition: Menlo Park, New Jersey, the home of Thomas Edison's research laboratory

夢見.definition: to dream about (sth or sb); to see in a dream

夢話.definition: talking in one's sleep; words spoken during sleep; fig. speech bearing no relation to reality; delusions

夢遊.definition: to sleepwalk; to journey in a dream

夢魔.definition: night demon (malign spirit believed to plague people during sleep)
